data.title: Great chai!
data.text: Took my teenage daughter here a few weeks ago. Her chai was amazing - the best we ever had! My mocha was yummy! We got a cookie to share and it was pretty dry and bland...I would skip that next time. The atmosphere is chill...very neat place downtown. Check it out!

data.title: Always Delightful
data.text: Great coffee, great music, amazing staff, fabulous environment.  Love the farm-to-table approach and love of the community.

data.title: nice place to meet for a cup of coffee
data.text: Met with a friend and had a snack and a coffee, people there are very sweet and everything has an organic element to it, very calming and peaceful, and their coffee is excellent, have a lot of tea blends too, need more coffee choices.

data.title: Great spot!
data.text: One of my  most fave coffee shops! Great coffee, friendly service. Best Chai I ever had! Cute little spot to grab a pick me up!

data.title: Neat Little Coffeeshop Downtown
data.text: Visited once for a light lunch.  The coffee was superb, and the muffin I purchased was large and delicious.  The decor is industrial, but comfortable.  It's a very cozy little cafe, and most people seem to come in and get their coffee and go.  The staff was very friendly and willing to answer my questions.  There is also a massage parlor downstairs, which I have not visited yet, but plan to in the future.

data.title: What a Cup! What a cookie!
data.text: I wandered in off the street because I smelled the coffee and I was a little cold. I did not think I would find such a cool shop in the downtown area. Youngstown surprised me again! I was captivated by the various mixed tea varieties that they had there in corked bottles so that customers could smell the mixtures before buying them. The espresso was awesome but the shortbread cookie wedges were amazing! I do think that the prices are a little high but the quality was there to back it up so i guess I cant complain. I will go back again and again!
